doc.title: Jaipur: The Star of India
doc.plot: 1936. A time with no computer gadgets & mobile phones. Massive steam trains and fragile wooden biplanes are the only modern ways to explore the vast subcontinent India. A time where one still had white spots on the maps of the world. A time where four youngsters stumble into the greatest and most daring adventure of their life: The search for the long lost Star of India. The hero is Alexander Parziwall, a courageous young kid from Berlin, who has to stop a group of thief's before they steal the largest sapphire in the world: The Star of India. On his quest Alexander is aided by his English buddy Spencer and two newly found Indian friends. A race for time begins, when Alexander's father, the only pilot in the region, has been kidnapped by Malice Raven. A notorious Dutch thief, who will not stop for anything to get her hands on the Star of India.
